KYC.PassedLimitParagraph: Sorry! you have reached our limit for the number of times you can request a verification code. You can try again in 10 minutes

fields.email_disclaimer_1: By confirming your email, you agree to our
fields.email_disclaimer_3: and that you have read and understood our
fields.code_hasnt_arrived_tooltip: If code hasn't arrived Make sure you have entered the correct email address. Check your spam folder.
fields.phone_code_hasnt_arrived_tooltip: If code hasn't arrived You might be experiencing mobile network issues, check network settings on your phone.
fields.pass_must_have_lower_case_letter: a minimum of 1 lower case letter [a-z]
fields.pass_must_have_upper_case_letter: a minimum of 1 upper case letter [A-Z]

companyAcc.title: I want to create a company account
companyAcc.description: Business activity under a legal entity such as a Enterprise; Company; Institutions; Licensed / Tiny Dealer; Association, etc

privateAcc.title: I want to create a private account
privateAcc.description: A private person who operates independently and personally not in a business setting
privateAcc.id_file: Upload ID / Driving License / Passport file
privateAcc.country_not_from_israel: We are sorry, private registration is currently not available in this country

invitedAcc.title: I was invited to join a company
invitedAcc.description: You received an invitation to join a companyâ€™s account

KYC_Step_2.OfakimEmailInUse: Hi. Your email address already exists in the system. Please log in with your regular credentials and continue your registration process from the system.
KYC_Step_2.p_1: We need an email address that is not already used for another account.

KYC_Step_3.title: Confirm your email
KYC_Step_3.p_1: Check your spam folder and the spelling of your email address.

KYC_Step_4.title: Enter your phone number
KYC_Step_4.p_1: We will only use this number for account setup and for security purposes, such as two-factor authentication. We do not share personal information with third parties.

KYC_Step_5.title: Confirm your phone number
KYC_Step_5.p_1: We've sent you a confirmation code via SMS.

KYC_Step_6.title: Create your password
KYC_Step_6.p_1: Create a strong password and keep it secure.

KYC_Step_7.title: Personal details
KYC_Step_7.p_1: As stated on your official ID. We will need your name to verify your identity.
KYC_Step_7.unverified: User couldn't be verified, please make sure you upload a clear and legible document!

KYC_Step_8.title: Home address
KYC_Step_8.p_1: By law, we require your home address to open your account.

EMAIL_VERIFICATION.title: Confirm your email
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.p_1: Check your spam folder and the spelling of your email address.

FORMS_ERRORS.future_date: Date must be a future date.
FORMS_ERRORS.en_pattern: Only English letters, numbers, and the characters are allowed
FORMS_ERRORS.only_english_and_numbers_and_space: Only English letters and numbers are allowed.
FORMS_ERRORS.not_valid_id_number: The ID number you have entered isn't a valid one.
FORMS_ERRORS.password_special_characters: One of the characters entered is invalid
FORMS_ERRORS.minAnnualAmount: You must enter a new annual amount that is higher than this amount:
FORMS_ERRORS.mustBeMultipliedBy: The amount should be in multiples of
FORMS_ERRORS.fileNotSupported: The uploaded file type is not supported.
FORMS_ERRORS.fileSizeNotAllowed: The file is too large. allowed maximum size is
FORMS_ERRORS.fileSizeExceedsForUpload: The uploaded file exceeds the maximum size limit of 5 MB. Please choose a smaller file.
FORMS_ERRORS.FileDoesntUpload: Upload failed. The file upload is taking too long. Please check your internet connection and try again.

NEW_BENEFICIARY_PAYMENT_REASONS.CapitalRefund: Return of investment fund (with accountant approval)
NEW_BENEFICIARY_PAYMENT_REASONS.InBoarderTransfer: Transfer to an Israeli resident, to an Israeli bank only
NEW_BENEFICIARY_PAYMENT_REASONS.ImportOfGoodsNotIncludingBooks: Import of goods not including books
